TopicTitle: PSA: PresMat Barometer & 2HOT Thermometer Now Usable In More Biomes

Articles.Content: Just wanted to share something I found since the new update, previously you could not use the PresMat Barometer & 2HOT Thermometer in "high space", but now you can. Just a heads-up to try using science equipment in places where it they did not previously work.

There don't seem to be any limitations on where experiments can be performed any longer, indeed. Which is very helpful since the tech tree needs a whole lot more science points to unlock everything...

Finally. Those restrictions were always annoying.

"SORRY SIR CANNOT READ THERMOMETER BECAUSE LOLSPACE DEAL WITH IT"

> 
> Just wanted to share something I found since the new update, previously you could not use the PresMat Barometer & 2HOT Thermometer in "high space", but now you can. Just a heads-up to try using science equipment in places where it they did not previously work.

Actually you couldn't use the PresMat in space *at all* before. Which was kinda dumb..

Somewhere on Minmus...

Jeb: Hey, Bob - will I need my suit helmet out there?

Bob: Huh.. dunno, PresMat is reading zero, so I guess it's broken. Probably fine though; it IS green outside.

Jeb: That it is. \*steps outside, air escapes, everybody asphyxiates\*

A reading of zero is still a reading..

> 
> Actually you couldn't use the PresMat in space *at all* before. Which was kinda dumb..

Agreed. A reading of "no reading" is still scientifically beneficial. I am glad they addressed this in 1.0!
